sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3900 ( DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , RESN_REGN_NUM , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , PAY_PYMT_DT , PAY_ITEM_NM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #pymtYrMnth# , #payCd# , #resnRegnNum# , #payItemCd# , #payItemSeilNum# , #systemkey# , #pymtDducDivCd# , #pymtDducSum# , #pymtDducTxtnAmnt# , #pymtDducFreeDtySum# , #payPymtDt# , #payItemNm# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3900 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# , PAY_CD=#payCd# , RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# , PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD=#pymtDducDivCd# , PYMT_DDUC_SUM=#pymtDducSum# , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT=#pymtDducTxtnAmnt# , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM=#pymtDducFreeDtySum# , PAY_PYMT_DT=#payPymtDt# , PAY_ITEM_NM=#payItemNm# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3900 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , RESN_REGN_NUM , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , PAY_PYMT_DT , PAY_ITEM_NM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3900 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# AND PAY_ITEM_CD=#payItemCd# AND PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payItemSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , RESN_REGN_NUM , PAY_ITEM_CD , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , SYSTEMKEY , PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , PYMT_DDUC_SUM , PYMT_DDUC_TXTN_AMNT , PYMT_DDUC_FREE_DTY_SUM , PAY_PYMT_DT , PAY_ITEM_NM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3900 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , PYMT_YR_MNTH DESC , PAY_CD DESC , RESN_REGN_NUM DESC , PAY_ITEM_CD DESC , PAY_ITEM_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3900 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
PYMT_YR_MNTH LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
